page.title: 13MEDIA
page.content: There are two main newspapers in the Wrexham area.The first is the Evening Leader which covers local and national news.The second,which is most probably the most popular of the two is the Wrexham Leader.This covers local news only.It is distributed on a Friday.It refers to topics such as football,people retiring,letters sent in by local people,news about Guides/Cubs etc.,radio programmes,Welsh reports,community services,local disasters or deaths, village news,looking back and crime.There are other free local newspapers but they are not in the league of the two mentioned.There is also 'Marcher Sound',a commercial radio in Clwyd and 'Radio Clwyd' run by the BBC at intervals during the day.
